title: Short-Intensive Workshop for Developing Instructional Design Expertise

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental instructional design theories and experience in utilizing design tools
context.additional_context: Requires a classroom environment conducive to learner collaboration, with a system for sharing materials and providing feedback using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can identify five core elements of the instructional design process by analyzing expert modeling cases
Learners can implement strategies to improve the validity of instructional design documents by over 80% through peer feedback
Learners can explain their instructional design competency growth process in three or more stages through weekly reflective journaling
Learners can derive two practically applicable instructional design solutions through collaboration with peers in supportive learning community activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
